bill_title: to create a task force to assist in the efforts to promote the cooperative processing of livestock and grains.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to create a task force to assist in the efforts to promote the cooperative processing of livestock and grains. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: There is hereby created the Strategic Value-added Task Force to assist in efforts in the promotion of cooperatives to process livestock and grain. The Task Force shall be initiated and coordinated by the Department of Agriculture to provide technical assistance in the area of business, law, engineering, the environment, and other disciplines with the assistance of the Board of Regents and the Governor's Office of Economic Development. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
